recent_emails.subject: RE: Enterprise Agreement Renewal — Timeline
recent_emails.snippet: Marcus, we need to finalize the renewal terms by March 15. Our CFO wants to see a clear ROI summary before approving the expanded scope. Can we schedule a call next week?

recent_emails.subject: Fabric Workspace Performance Concerns
recent_emails.snippet: Hi Priya, we've been experiencing latency issues in our supply chain analytics pipeline on Fabric. Query times have increased 3x over the past month. This is affecting our daily reporting.

recent_emails.subject: AI Strategy Briefing Request
recent_emails.snippet: We're putting together our AI roadmap for the next fiscal year and would love to get Microsoft's perspective on Copilot and Foundry for our bottling operations.

recent_meetings.title: Coca-Cola QBR — Q4 Review
recent_meetings.notes: Reviewed Q4 usage metrics. Coca-Cola expressed strong interest in expanding Copilot from 5,000 to 15,000 seats. Fabric adoption growing in supply chain team. Action: send AI strategy proposal by Feb 28.

recent_meetings.title: Technical Deep Dive — Fabric Performance
recent_meetings.notes: Investigated Fabric query latency. Root cause: unoptimized Delta Lake partitioning on supply chain datasets. Priya to provide optimization guide.

teams_messages.message: Heads up — Sarah mentioned their board meeting is March 20. If we can get the renewal + Copilot expansion signed before then, it'll be a great story for their digital transformation update.
Support ticket from David Park's team about Fabric latency is now P2. They're running into it daily. We should address this before the renewal conversation.

coca-cola.relationship_summary: Strong 8-year strategic partnership. $12M annual spend. Enterprise Agreement renewal due March 15, 2026. Active expansion discussions for M365 Copilot (5K → 15K seats) and Fabric. Key risk: open P2 support ticket on Fabric performance. Board meeting March 20 — potential showcase moment.
